lead_paragraph: The walk is over. But the journey, George Martin said, continues. Martin, the former Giants co-captain who walked across the country to raise money for 9/11 responders with respiratory ailments, is set to deliver the first sums to three New York City area hospitals at a fund-raiser Saturday at the Sports Museum of America in Lower Manhattan. “I see this whole thing coming full circle,” Martin said. “It’s a problem that’s large in its scope. I wanted people to know that even if we couldn’t solve the problem, we could raise money and bring awareness to it.”.
